Spacepal is a web-version of Konquest st: Spacepal is a web-version of Konquest strategy game.
The goal of the game is to expand your p: The goal of the game is to expand your power across the universe.
This is the list of rooms, that are crea: This is the list of rooms, that are created by other players.

This is form for game creation: This is form for game creation
It's good to set map width > height. Set small map: 8x6.
Set a pincode so that other players can: Set a pincode in order to avoid joining of other players.
pac-help: PAC [production after capture]: if you capture planet ships'll be increased by production  in the same turn.
accum-help: Accum [accumulative]: every turn increase production on each player's planet. It's good to set for beginners.
pirates-help: Pirates is a game random factor. They attack fleets and player planets.
buffs-help: Buffs: in the developing. It will be soon.
This is the room. Players are waiting fo: This is the room. Players are waiting for start here.
room-map-help-1: This is the preview of the map.
room-map-help-2: The capitals are future planets of the players.
room-map-help-3: Neutral planets do not belong to anyone and they are peaceful.
room-planet-help-1: A planet has kill percentage and production
room-planet-help-2: The production determines the number of ships that will be built
room-planet-help-3: The kill % determinates a power of one ship
room-members-help-2: If the player joins, he will appear here. The creator can add bots.
room-members-help-creator-2: If the player joins, he will appear here. You can add bots.
room-members-help-3: Bots are simple game AI. They are good opponents for beginners.
room-members-help-4: The game can be started if count of members is greater than 2.
room-actions-help-creator-1: If you are ready you can start the game
room-actions-help-creator-2: Button Regen shuffle planets on the map.
room-actions-help-creator-3: If you exit the game, the following player will become admin or the game will be deleted.
game-help-2: Each player has one planet (the color of planet is the color of the player).
game-help-3: It's a good idea to capture nearest planet with low kill %. This is necessary to increase the total production.
game-help-noaccum-4: Production in this game is constant. It means that you can't capture powerful planet at the beginning.
game-help-accum-4: The longer the planet belongs to you, the more production it has.
game-help-pirates-5: Space pirates are aggressive in space and sometimes attack planets.
game-help-6: Press the key Q for show the status of the game.
game-help-map-1: To zoom the map use mouse wheel or +/- keys.
game-help-map-2: To navigate the map use arrow keys or middle mouse button (or shift + left mouse button).
game-help-7: Other players don't know about your tasks.
game-help-8: To send ships click on your planet (press Home for goto there), then on the target planet. The attack of ships is the same with the attack of the planet-sender.
game-help-9: Players make a move concurrently. The game turn will end when all players make a move. After making a move, you can not return the fleet back.
game-help-10: To control the ships before their departure, press the key T.
game-help-11: When you are ready to end the turn, press key space.
game-help-12: To view the hotkeys, press key K.
